docs.snippet: In a single-admission doubleheader, the Yankees opened with a 4-3 win over the Pirates before dropping a sloppy second game, 5-3....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a single-admission doubleheader, the Yankees opened with a 4-3 win over the Pirates before dropping a sloppy second game, 5-3.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees and Pittsburgh Pirates each win one game in rare single-admission doubleheader; Yankees defeat Pirates, 4-3, in first game while Pirates best Yankees, 5-3, in the second.

headline.main: Teams Split, as Do Many Fans
